text: Nuno Filipe Rodrigues Silva (born 18 April 1979 in Vila Verde, Braga District), known as Reguila, is a Portuguese professional footballer who plays for Académico Futebol Clube de Martim as a striker. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:People from Vila Verde Category:Portuguese footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Primeira Liga players Category:LigaPro players Category:Portuguese Second Division players Category:C.D. title: Reguila
